news.title: Maersk gaar konkurs
news.author: Maersk
news.summary: Every year, Maersk Line reviews and rates our used containers. The condition of the containers is used to rate them in three different categories: Reuse, Repurpose and Recycle. The containers are then retired from active service in our fleet and put up for sale.

news.title: Maersk har mirakel vaekst
news.author: Maersk Line
news.summary: The containers are then added to the webshop and can be found based on various criterias. You can search by class, type, size, location, etc.
